link.info: This will make the entire text function as a link.  If you enable this you should not include links within the above text.
link.label: Announcement link

display_type.info: To customize your list, choose 'Custom list' and add article blocks to the section.
display_type.label: Blog posts source

show_view_all.info: Appears at the end of the list if there are more products than shown.
show_view_all.label: Show view all link

video_url.info: Use a direct link to an .mp4 video file. This will override the above image. [Learn more here](https://fluorescent.co/help/stiletto/video-hero#set-up-video-player).
video_url.label: Video URL

show_recaptcha_terms.info: Recommended if your store preferences have spam protection enabled.
show_recaptcha_terms.label: Show reCAPTCHA terms

width.label: Block width
width.info: All blocks appear full width on mobile

title.info: Include a heading for your text. The heading functions as a toggle on smaller screen sizes.
title.label: Heading

collapse_on_mobile.info: Heading is required if this is enabled
collapse_on_mobile.label: Collapse on mobile

desktop_width.info: For best results, ensure all footer block widths add up to 100%
desktop_width.label: Desktop width

show_title_on_desktop.info: The heading is always shown on smaller screen sizes.
show_title_on_desktop.label: Show heading on desktop

title.info: The heading functions as a toggle on smaller screen sizes.
title.label: Heading

payment__header.info: Only shows icons for payment types that your store supports.

social_media__header.info: You can edit your Social Media links in the "Social Media" area of the theme settings

background_color.info: Determines the background color of the block when no media is used or when using the "Contain" Media Fit setting.
background_color.label: Background

link.info: Grid item will link to the url.
link.label: Button link

enable_transparent_on_collection.info: This setting requires that you have Collection images and have enabled full-width within your Collection pages Section.
enable_transparent_on_collection.label: Enable on collection pages

enable_transparent_on_home.info: Ensure that you have a Slideshow, Video hero, Image hero, or Image hero split section as the first section on your homepage.
enable_transparent_on_home.label: Enable on home page

logo_transparent.info: Default logo will be used if no image is set.
logo_transparent.label: Logo image

social_media__header.info: You can edit your Social Media links in the "Social Media" area of the theme settings

height_paragraph.content: Custom heights are a percentage of the screen height.

link.info: If button label is blank the image will link to the url.
link.label: Button link

height_paragraph.content: Custom heights are a percentage of the screen height.

image_aspect.info: If original is chosen the second image will respect the first image's natural size on larger screens.
image_aspect.label: Image height

paragraph__preivew_image.content: If you include a link in social media posts, the page’s featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images).

paragraph__store_title.content: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store).

show_tags.info: Tags appear above titles like categories. You can choose which tags to show by going to Theme settings -> Blog.
show_tags.label: Show tags

image.info: This image will override collection images and appear on all collections. Use a dynamic source to set different custom images for multiple collections. [Learn more](https://fluorescent.co/help/stiletto/collection-pages#collection-banner)
image.label: Image

pagination.info: Choose how additional pages of products are navigated.

paragraph.content: All of your collections are listed by default. To customize your list, choose 'Selected' and add collection to the collection list

social_icons.content: The social icons and their links are configured in Theme settings > Social Media.
social_icons.name: Social icons

height_paragraph.content: Custom heights are a percentage of the screen height. Image height requires an image be setup below.

heading.info: Include a heading that explains the content.
heading.label: Heading

page_for_content.info: This will override the above text input
page_for_content.label: Page for content

show_dynamic_checkout.info: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)
show_dynamic_checkout.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons

popup_page.info: Choose a page as a source for the popup content. You can add text, tables, or images to this page.
popup_page.label: Content

inventory_max.info: Enter the initial quantity of your product inventory. Insert a Dynamic source to set different base quantities for multiple products. [Learn more](https://fluorescent.co/help/stiletto/product-pages#stock-level-indicator)
inventory_max.label: Inventory base quantity

low_inventory_threshold.info: Set the product inventory quantity to alert customers when limited quantities are available. Insert a Dynamic source to set different thresholds for multiple products. [Learn more](https://fluorescent.co/help/stiletto/product-pages#stock-level-indicator)
low_inventory_threshold.label: Low inventory threshold

header__rating.info: To display a rating, add a [product rating app](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/product-reviews)

paragraph__1.content: If you include a link in social media posts, the page’s featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images).

paragraph__2.content: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store).

header__swatches.info: The configuration of swatches can be found in the "Product" area of the theme settings.

popup__header.info: Add a popup to display extra information about your products, like a size guide.

variant_popup_option.info: Write the option name that will display a link to the information popup. Example: "Size".
variant_popup_option.label: Option name

variant_popup_page.info: Choose a page as a source for the popup content. You can add text, tables, or images to this page.
variant_popup_page.label: Content

header.info: This template customizes the Quick View popover, and is shown when a customer uses the Quick View button in product listings.

pagination.info: Choose how additional pages of results are navigated.

dropdown_parent_link.info: Name the link in the main menu that you'd like the menu to appear from.
dropdown_parent_link.label: Dropdown parent link

minimum_image_width.info: The image may exceed this number depending on the menu contents and the chosen aspect ratio: it will allways fill the availabe vertical space
minimum_image_width.label: Minimum promo width

enable_transparent.info: Ensure that you have a Slideshow, Video hero, Image hero, or Image hero split section as the first section on your password page.
enable_transparent.label: Enable on password page

background_color.info: Used when no background image is selected.
background_color.label: Background color

enable_popup.info: Show a popup the first time the user's cursor leaves your site.
enable_popup.label: Enable

paragraph__intro.content: Dynamic recommendations use order and product information to change and improve over time. [Learn more](https://shopify.dev/themes/product-merchandising/recommendations)

background_color.info: Used when no background image is selected.
background_color.label: Background color

collection_list.info: A maximum of 4 collections will be shown
collection_list.label: Collection list

enable_quick_cart.info: If "purchase confirmation popup" within the theme settings is disabled the quick cart will appear once a product has been added to the cart.
enable_quick_cart.label: Enable quick cart

autoplay_delay.label: Time between quotes if autoplay enabled

content_background_padding.info: Applies to blocks when "Show background behind columns" is enabled.
content_background_padding.label: Content background padding

background_color.info: Used when no background image is selected.
background_color.label: Background color

content_position_desktop.info: Content will always appear above the image on smaller screens.
content_position_desktop.label: Content position

link.info: If button label is blank the image will link to the url.
link.label: Button link

height_paragraph.content: Custom heights are a percentage of the screen height. If you choose Original it is important that your images maintain the same shape between slides.
Custom heights are a percentage of the screen height.

video_url.info: Use a direct link to an .mp4 video file. [Learn more here](https://fluorescent.co/help/stiletto/video-hero#set-up-video-player).
video_url.label: Background video link

enable_section_animations.label: Enable section animations
enable_section_animations.info: Each section will also offer the ability to opt out of animating.

article_categories.info: All tags are used as categories by default. To filter to specific tags, enter a comma separated list: "News, Lifestyle, Tutorials, Interviews".
article_categories.label: Article categories

cart_item_aspect_ratio.info: Applies to all cart item images within the cart template, quick cart, and purchase confirmation popup.
cart_item_aspect_ratio.label: Cart item image aspect ratio

enable_confirmation_popup.info: Confirmation popup will appear once a product has been added to the cart.
enable_confirmation_popup.label: Enable purchase confirmation popup

enable_free_shipping_bar.info: The free shipping bar will show within the quick cart, purchase confirmation, and cart template.
enable_free_shipping_bar.label: Enable free shipping bar

free_shipping_threshold.info: Enter the value without a currency symbol and use a decimal to separate dollars and cents. Example: '100.00'
free_shipping_threshold.label: Free shipping minimum amount

paragraph__free_shipping_bar.content: The free shipping bar is configured separately from your actual shipping rates, which need to be [configured separately](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/shipping/setting-up-and-managing-your-shipping/free-shipping-rates#free-shipping-over-a-certain-value).

paragraph__free_shipping_bar_disclaimer.content: Note that the free shipping bar currently only works with the default currency of your store. If your store sells in multiple currencies, consider disabling this feature or visiting our help docs for possible workarounds.

favicon.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px
favicon.label: Favicon image

chip_options.info: Variant option name to use for displaying chips. Use a comma separated list to support multiple options: "Size, Material, Fabric".
chip_options.label: Variant option for chips

swatch_options.info: Variant option name to use for displaying swatches. Use a comma separated list to support multiple options: "Color, Style, Finish"
swatch_options.label: Variant option for swatches

product_badges.info: Product badges appear on product listings and in the header of product pages
product_badges.name: Product badges

header__custom_badges.info: For each group below you may enter a set of product tags that will appear as badges in a given color

show_swatches.info: Reveals product swatches on hover. To learn more about setting up swatches and chips, check out our [documentation](https://fluorescent.co/help/stiletto/theme-settings#product).
show_swatches.label: Show swatches

enable_quick_search.info: Displays live search results. Not available in all languages. [Learn more](https://fluorescent.co/help/stiletto/theme-settings#quick-search)
enable_quick_search.label: Enable quick search

paragraph__promotion.content: Promote collections while a search hasn’t been made yet.

video_url.info: Use a direct link to an .mp4 video file. [Learn more here](https://fluorescent.co/help/stiletto/video-hero#set-up-video-player).
video_url.label: Video link

header.info: The configuration for these badges can be found in the "Product badges" area of the theme settings

background_color.info: Used when no background image is selected.
background_color.label: Background color

header__country.info: To add a country, go to your [markets settings.](/admin/settings/markets)

header__language.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings.](/admin/settings/languages)

enable_sticky_filter_bar.label: Enable sticky filter and sort bar

media_fit.info: This will have no effect on images with "Natural" aspect ratio.
media_fit.label: Media fit

enable_animation.label: Enable animation
enable_animation.info: Ensure section animations are enabled in the theme settings

show_chip_filters.info: The configuration of chip selectors can be found in the "Product" area of the theme settings.
show_chip_filters.label: Show chip filters

show_filters.info: Allow customers to filter by product options, product type, price, availability, and more. [Customize filters](/admin/menus)
show_filters.label: Enable filtering

show_swatch_filters.info: The configuration of swatches can be found in the "Product" area of the theme settings.
show_swatch_filters.label: Show swatch filters
